data.title: Polite staff; clean; great food
data.text: First time here. Very polite staff. Clean inside. Excellent soft pretzels (with dipping sauce) and dogs. Too bad we live 6 hours away! Worth the visit!!!

data.title: Enjoyed
data.text:
Found Not Just Franks while just walking around town on a Saturday while in the area for a race.  Not sure about trying but seemed busy so decided to go in.  Glad we did very limited menu hot dogs and pretzels.  The hot dogs very tasty and the hot pretzels great.  Rated a 5 star because comparing to other like places.  Found the staff even though very busy to be friendly and helpful. The dining area and bathrooms very clean.  There was a line ordering the entire time we were there.  Not fine dining but great food and prices.

Will return.

data.title: WORTH Dropping in...a Local Icon Type
data.text:
For what it is (a hot dog establishment), this is a positive experience.

The place is unpretentious and staffed with friendly locals who seem to enjoy serving customers.

I noticed during midday, there were line about six people deep inside the place.  I came back around 1300 hours when it was quiet and ordered a hot dog with chili, slaw and mustard for $2.00.  The hot dog was good with plenty of chili over it.

I was informed by the person who served the hot dog that their other half of the business is pretzels.

There are tables which one can sit to eat.

If in Concord again and have a craving for a hot dog (or a pretzels), Not Just Franks will be patronized...

data.title: Average Hot Dog stop
data.text: My daughter and I will stop here for a cheap eat. It's nothing fancy. It's a cheap eat. Personally, Lowes Hot dogs are better... but this place works too.

data.title: Cheap Lunch but Great Dogs
data.text:
Visiting Downtown Concord on a hot Summer day and I was in the mood for Hot Dogs. My wife does not like Hot Dogs and makes a fuss every time I order them so today was my day.

This place is on the lower end of Downtown Concord on Union Street across from the old Court House. Very spartan but the put out a great product at a very good price.

They have a three dog special for $5.00 with a number of topping available. Only one that is extra is cheese and that's only 10 cents.  You can upscale to the combo which includes a drink and a bag of Chip for $7.15.

I went with the three dog combo with mustard, ketchup, onions and Chili and they were great. Not over cooked and straight out of the steamer. Buns were good too and the chili was excellent.

Made for a great lunch that just hit the spot.

As the name implies, the Not Just Franks also includes Pretzels. Did not try them but they looked good and they have a way of both increasing sales and giving the customer a chance to do something to make someone else feel good.  For a dollar, you can buy a Pretzel to give to the next customer. In the process you can also leave a note of encouragement as well.

data.title: Hot Dogs and Pretzels
data.text: The choices here are simple: hot dogs and pretzels.  The hotdogs are great, but the pretzels are worth the trip!  They are made to order and melt in your mouth.  We are regulars!

data.title: Best hot dogs in Concord
data.text:
I love their hot dogs with chili!  Limited menu ;hot dogs, large Cinnamon or cheese pretzels and soft drinks,
Parking is either on street in front or public lot around back.
